title: Henry R. Carse, "Sinai: The Abundant Emptiness" (Ziggurat Books, 2013)
description:
Dr. Henry R. Carse is a is a poet, a pilgrim, a practitioner theologian and a peace activist. He is the founder of Kids4Peace International – an interfaith youth movement that teaches and practices dignity in Jerusalem (where he lived for 40 years) and cities throughout North America. Today I discussed his meditation on the Sinai desert, Sinai: The Abundant Emptiness (Ziggurat Books, 2013) Carse is an native of Vermont and currently resides there.
